item.description:
An informal drop in meeting, the 4th Tuesday of each month, at the Beth Israel Deaconess Hospital Coffee Shop, in Needham Center.
Contact omcmeel07@comcast.net for more information...


THE MAIN HOSPITAL ENTRANCE IS NOW CLOSED AT 6PM. PLEASE USE THE ER ENTRANCE TO ACCESS THE MAIN HOSPITAL AND USE THE ELEVATOR OR STAIRWAY TO THE 1ST FLOOR.
IF YOU ARE HAVING ANY PROBLEMS FINDING US PLEASE CALL OLIVE AT 508 367 8093.
THANK YOU AND SORRY ABOUT ANY INCONVENIENCE THIS MAY CAUSE YOU.

group.name: The Boston Area Young Widow and Widowers Group

item.name: Young Widowed Group Meeting
